pre_animation: v.hand_bob = q.life_time < 0.01 ? 0.0 : v.hand_bob + ((q.is_on_ground && q.is_alive ? math.clamp(math.sqrt(math.pow(q.position_delta(0), 2.0) + math.pow(q.position_delta(2), 2.0)), 0.0, 0.1) : 0.0) - v.hand_bob) * 0.02;

v.u = (q.is_using_item(0) == 'acr' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'ak47' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'as50' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'awp' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'deagle' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'dmr' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'fn57' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'fnfal' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'g36c' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'glock18' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'hk417' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'm1garand' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'm4a1' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'm9' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'm107' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'm240b' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'm1911' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'mac10' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'magnum' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'minigun' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'mk48mod' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'mossberg500' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'mp5' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'mpt55' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'p90' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'p250' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'r870' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'rpk' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'scar' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'sporter22' || q.is_using_item(0) == 'vector');

v.holding_any_firearm = (v.deagle || v.fn57 || v.glock18 || v.m9 || v.m1911 || v.magnum || v.p250 || v.mac10 || v.mp5 || v.p90 || v.vector || v.mossberg500 || v.r870 || v.acr || v.ak47 || v.fnfal || v.g36c || v.hk417 || v.m4a1 || v.mpt55 || v.rpk || v.scar || v.sporter22 || v.as50 || v.awp|| v.dmr || v.m1garand || v.m107 || v.m240b || v.minigun || v.mk48mod);
